name: Paleocalypse 3 - Lost in a Past Future
name_original: Paleocalypse 3 - Lost in a Past Future
description:
Game Characteristics

Geoff is retrieved in the geological time, but this time something goes wrong and he is catapulted into the future of the Earth. A large desert called Pangea Ultima occupy the Earth in this future, and humankind is not present. Here Exel, a scientist, say to Geoff that he may have finally found a cure for its transformation into a dinosaur, but a lot of radiations in this futuristic Earth prevent his experiments in order to do this. For this reason he called him, and also to investigate where all humankind disappeared and which disasters are waiting. Now the Earth is also tidally locked with a misterious planetary body and one side is always in the sunlight and another part is always in the night. Both will understand that a catastrophe from a star is coming and these could be the final days of the Earth if they don't find a way to solve this announced apocalypse. 

In this 2D Zelda-style action RPG/adventure game you will explore several different locations and dungeons around the main world. During your adventure you will find other tools that will help you to open new paths and discover new places. The free exploration of the environment is accompanied by a great storytelling.

Main features:

- An entire world to explore

- 8 different dungeons

- Different tools and weapons to use

- Several battles and puzzles

- An intriguing science-based storytelling

Minimum requirements:

OS: Windows 7 or higher

Processor: Intel Core i7-3632QM 2.2GHz or higher

Memory: 1 GB RAM

Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730M or higher

DirectX: Version 9.0c

Storage: 270 MB available space

Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
